para.text: A wholesale distributor, pharmacist, or pharmacy shall distribute or hold for sale medications bearing a manufacturer's expiration date pursuant to 21 C.F.R. §211.137.

A wholesale distributor, pharmacist, or pharmacy shall have adequate and credible provisions for return of outdated drugs, including but not limited to partials, through its wholesaler distributor or reverse distributor.

annotations.annotation: Health Occupations Article, §12-205, Annotated Code of Maryland
Regulation .01 amended effective July 1, 2010 (37:10 Md. R. 722)
